title: The said Regulations shall be applicable to the area under jurisdiction of SRA, Pune i
clause_text: The said Regulations shall be applicable to the area under jurisdiction of SRA, Pune i.e. the entire area of Pune Municipal Corporation (P.M.C.), Pimpri-Chinchwad Municipal Corporation (P.C.M.C.) and P.M.R.D.A. (restricted to earlier P.C.N.T.D.A. Area) and
